00024 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Mail extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Default {

00033         public function render($gp,$errors) {
00034 
00035 
00036                 session_start();
00037 
00038                 //set GET/POST parameters
00039                 $this->gp = $gp;
00040 
00041                 //set template
00042                 $this->template = $this->subparts['template'];
00043 
00044                 //set settings
00045                 $this->settings = $this->parseSettings();
00046 
00047                 //set language file
00048                 if(!$this->langFile) {
00049                         $this->readLangFile();
00050                 }
00051                 
00052                 //substitute ISSET markers
00053                 $this->substituteIssetSubparts();
00054 
00055                 //fill TypoScript markers
00056                 if(is_array($this->settings['markers.'])) {
00057                         $this->fillTypoScriptMarkers();
00058                 }
00059 
00060                 //fill default markers
00061                 $this->fillDefaultMarkers();
00062 
00063                 //fill value_[fieldname] markers
00064                 $this->fillValueMarkers();
00065 
00066                 //fill LLL:[language_key] markers
00067                 $this->fillLangMarkers();
00068 
00069 
00070                 //remove markers that were not substituted
00071                 $content = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::removeUnfilledMarkers($this->template);
00072 
00073 
00074                 return trim($content);
00075         }
